instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1502: What is A1502? A1502 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Mid 2014, Late 2013, Early 2015 with EMC 2875, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-3476, 820-3536, 820-4924..
definitions.820-4924: What is 820-4924? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a no backlight Display problem
threads.message:
i am just working on this machine.

the board is ok, the display from a known good device is working on this machine
the faulty display has no backlight, with a lamp behin the logo is everything to see.

is there any posibility to fix that display anyhow? i have 2 of this faulty displays with same symptoms

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a no backlight Display problem
threads.message:
Probably not worth to repair LEDs strip on the faulty screen.
First be sure the LCD is compatible with your machine.
2015 model is unique, doesn't accept previous <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> screens.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a no backlight Display problem
threads.message: sorry, both screens had bad LVDS cable and the "new" cable was defective as well.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1502</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a no backlight Display problem
threads.message: thanks, yes both screens and machina was 2015
